meta.title: About
meta.description: Learn how Web of Trust solves the spam and identity problem on Nostr through social distance and trust-based filtering.

hero.title: Understanding Web of Trust
hero.subtitle: A decentralized approach to reputation and spam filtering on Nostr, built on the principle of social distance.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Nostr has no central authority to filter spam or verify identity. Traditional blocklists are centralized and don't scale. Web of Trust solves this by measuring
problem.descriptionContinued: —how many hops separate you from someone in the follow graph.

oneHop.title: 1-Hop (Direct Follows)
oneHop.description: People you explicitly chose to follow. High trust by definition—these are your curated connections.

twoHop.title: 2-Hop (Extended Network)
twoHop.description: Friends of friends. Still likely to be real humans with shared interests. Good for content discovery.

threeHop.title: 3+ Hops (Unknown)
threeHop.description: No meaningful connection. Could be anyone—legitimate users or spam bots. Filter or review carefully.

useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.subtitle: Web of Trust enables a wide range of applications that benefit from decentralized reputation.

spamFiltering.title: Spam Filtering
spamFiltering.description: Filter content by social distance without centralized blocklists. Only show content from people within 2-3 hops.

trustScores.title: Trust Scores
trustScores.description: Build reputation systems for marketplaces, reviews, and recommendations based on social proximity.

smartNotifications.title: Smart Notifications
smartNotifications.description: Prioritize notifications from close connections. Alert immediately for 1-hop, batch for 2-hop, mute beyond.

contentDiscovery.title: Content Discovery
contentDiscovery.description: Surface content from your extended network. Find interesting posts from friends-of-friends.

codeExamples.title: Code Examples
codeExamples.jsComment: // Check if someone is in your web of trust
codeExamples.curlComment: # Query social distance between two users

playground.title: Try the Playground
playground.description: Explore your Web of Trust graph interactively. See your social connections, trust distances, and how the extension works in real-time.

steps.step2: Go to chrome://extensions in your browser
